topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555c0e396368724572401c00#post_555c0e396368724572401c00
i never said i had any final judgements on it, i dont take an opinion strongly on visuals alone, i just have strong doubts and compared to the previous things that Sanrio has done its obvious that theyre going for a completely different target audience so i feel that my doubts are fair. again i hold nothing against the show, hence why i specificied i was looking at it from an outsider view, because i knew i had the possibility of being wrong with what i thought. if i were being shallow about it then id be straight up saying "wow this show is fucking shit" without saying that my opinion is from an outside view, which is supposed to show how little weight i place on it until i actually bother with something.
